statements: SELECT * FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_id = 12345;
SELECT trader_id, trade_amount, trade_timestamp FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE market_regulations_complied = TRUE;
SELECT trade_amount, trade_timestamp, trader_id FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_id > 1000 ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trader_id, trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE market_regulations_complied = FALSE ORDER BY trader_id ASC, trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trader_id, trade_timestamp, trade_amount, market_regulations_complied FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trader_id = 101 ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, trader_id, trade_timestamp, trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE market_regulations_complied = TRUE ORDER BY trade_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trader_id, SUM(trade_amount) AS total_trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities GROUP BY trader_id HAVING COUNT(trade_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_trade_amount DESC;
SELECT trader_id, AVG(trade_amount) AS avg_trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_amount > 10000 GROUP BY trader_id HAVING COUNT(trade_id) < 5 ORDER BY trader_id;
SELECT trader_id, COUNT(trade_id) AS trade_count FROM trade_surveillance_activities GROUP BY trader_id ORDER BY trade_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM trade_surveillance_activities;
SELECT trader_name, trade_symbol, trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trader_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT trade_date, trader_name, trade_symbol FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_symbol, trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities ORDER BY trade_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_regulations WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_amount > 10000 ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_date, trade_amount, trade_symbol FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_amount < 5000 AND trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trader_name, trade_symbol, trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities ORDER BY trade_amount DESC, trade_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(trade_id) AS total_trades, AVG(trade_amount) AS avg_trade_amount FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trader_name = 'John Doe' AND trade_symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT * FROM Market_Regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM Market_Regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM Trade_Surveillance ORDER BY trade_volume DESC;
SELECT log_datetime, log_message FROM Surveillance_Logs WHERE log_id > 5 ORDER BY log_datetime ASC;
SELECT MAX(trade_volume) AS max_volume FROM Trade_Surveillance;
SELECT * FROM Trade_Surveillance WHERE trade_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT trade_symbol, trade_volume FROM Trade_Surveillance WHERE trade_volume > 1000 ORDER BY trade_volume DESC
SELECT t.trade_symbol, t.trade_volume, r.regulation_name FROM Trade_Surveillance AS t INNER JOIN Market_Regulations AS r ON t.trade_id = r.regulation_id
SELECT t.trade_symbol, t.trade_volume, l.log_message FROM Trade_Surveillance AS t LEFT JOIN Surveillance_Logs AS l ON t.trade_id = l.trade_id

SELECT t.trade_symbol, t.trade_date, l.log_datetime FROM Trade_Surveillance AS t LEFT JOIN Surveillance_Logs AS l ON t.trade_id = l.trade_id WHERE t.trade_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY l.log_datetime DESC
SELECT * FROM trade_activities;
SELECT trade_date, trade_type, traded_symbol FROM trade_activities WHERE trade_quantity > 100;
SELECT officer_name, officer_email FROM compliance_officers WHERE officer_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM surveillance_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM surveillance_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT * FROM trade_activities WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_quantity ASC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_email FROM compliance_officers WHERE officer_phone LIKE '%123%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_location = 'New York' OR agency_location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM compliance_officers INNER JOIN trade_activities ON compliance_officers.officer_id = trade_activities.trade_id WHERE officer_name LIKE 'John%' AND trade_type = 'Sell';
SELECT trade_quantity, traded_symbol FROM trade_activities JOIN surveillance_alerts ON trade_activities.trade_id = surveillance_alerts.trade_id WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT * FROM trade_surveillance_activities;
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_date FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT trader_name, trade_volume, trade_price FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-15' AND trader_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT officer_id, officer_name, officer_email FROM compliance_officers WHERE officer_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM trade_surveillance_activities ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_volume DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trader_name, trade_date FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_volume > 1000 ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT trader_name, trade_date, trade_volume, trade_price FROM trade_surveillance_activities WHERE trade_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM compliance_officers WHERE officer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY officer_id ASC;

SELECT t.trade_id, t.trader_name, t.trade_date, ta.alert_type FROM trade_surveillance_activities t INNER JOIN trade_alerts ta ON t.trade_id = ta.trade_id ORDER BY t.trade_date ASC, ta.alert_timestamp DESC;
